title: Unable to log onto league
body: since the new patch I can't log onto league but can still log in with my account through the league website, not sure if someones I don't know is using my account or if this is just a temporary bug, if someone is else is using my account does anyone know how to get rid of the person, I've already changed my password and my email. cheers

replies.body: Are you able to login now?  There were some issues overnight which should be resolved, so only temporary!
many people are having the same problem :O
